tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Thankfully I was so relaxed right from the beginning, as Dr Poonam had explained the whole procedure to me ..Her calm caring demeanour .. her warm friendliness..her expert touch was so comforting ..Dr Siddharth  , with his gentle touch and expertise too, also kept me from feeling any pain ..something I was really scared of !!...They were ably assisted by Harish ..
I was so impressed with the cleanliness and sterilisation process in the clinic ...
I have been very fortunate to get treated here ..Thank you so much Dr Poonam , Dr Siddharth .. and Harish ..üôèüèªGod bless you all ..üôèüèª

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Poonam Dutt is an excellent dentist. She did my cleaning and cavities with utmost care concern and to perfection. I strongly reccomend her to everyone who was a mix of warmth and professionalism. She is an ace dentist and I have been going to her for last 25 years. 
Thankyou Dr Poonam Dutt for always giving me the best.
Shabnam Chatterjee

review: Had a very delightful and satisfying experience. Resolved our dental problems with professional competence and patience.  Dr Poonam Dutt is a doctor with a humane touch. The staff is also very responsive and helpful. Covid regulations are all followed.

review: *** ****** **** ** * ***** ******** The way she explained the issue to me was very clear. Her friendliness and reassuring attitude make me less fearful of the problem. I have had three sittings with her and I am extremely satisfied. I would definitely recommend her to family and friends.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: A most professionally run clinic by Dr Poonam Dutt who is extremely  proficient and her wholesome experience is evident in the treatment. The staff is competent and very courteous. It is so reassuring to see and undergo the highest standards of hygiene and sanitation in these times of pandemic. Very impressed and satisfied with the entire experience. Thank you Dr Poonam Dutt.

review: Dr Poonam Dutt delivers her expertise with a personal touch; it is this balance  that brings me back to her for needful treatment. She has been treating me post maxillofacial surgery during Nov, 2011. Till mid of year 2015, i was based at Delhi, but even now I visit her from Bangalore when required - average 2 times a year.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am extremely scared of Doctors and getting treatements. Dr. Poonam Dutt made sure they told me about each step and put me at rest and reduced my worries. It was painless and having that constant interaction with her made me feel very comfortable.
The manager there, Dr. Harish too was extremely friendly and also took a lot of precautions before I entered the clinic. It was great to see them be covid safe as well.

As an expert in her area of practice she duly diagnosed my dental problems and treated accordingly. The pain was minimal and there were no hiccups at all. She explained the procedure with equal ease .  The clinic was spic and span while the instruments were of utmost quality as in detailed by the Doctor herself.  
The clinic is ideally located and in cognition with her skills.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
She is very polite and  explains well about the issues about gums. I was very  scared before  the procedure but she will assure you it won't be painful. She  is very professional that  I was very relaxed and comfortable during the procedure. At last she will give you very useful tips to maintain your gums. The  equipments used were also very hygienic. 

I would highly recommend  to visit Dr Poonam Dutt clinic.

review: Would not recommend her at all! Bad experience. Went to her for getting my broken tooth fix. She got me a cap too big for my size *** ****** ** ************* ** ******** ** ********** ** ** ***** **** ** *** ********** She also drilled my other tooth small and took no responsibility for it. She also had to drill my other teeth as the cap was too big ***** ***** ** ****** **** ********** I would recommend seeing some other dentist* *** *** ******** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** ** *** ************* ** ** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I reached the clinic with excruciating pain in my teeth and  left with no pain, all within an hour. Dr. Dutt is a thorough professional and incredibly friendly. She explained the problem and the treatment in a manner that was easy to understand and she put me at ease. She was thoughtful throughout the procedure and ensured that there was minimal discomfort and pain for me. Moreover, I appreciate the fact that she prioritises the patient and she chose to suggest dental fillings as treatment instead of suggesting root canal therapy at the outset. I would definitely recommend Dr. Dutt for dental procedures and consultation.
Dr Poonam Dutt is an experienced doctor who understood the problem and took time to explain it. Treatment is ongoing.
